name: Margaret Rogerson
bio: is the New York Times and internationally bestselling author of Sorcery of Thorns & Vespertine. Please contact me via my website; I don't check DMs!

bio_keywords.entity: an enchantment of ravens and sorcery of thorns

social_posts.post_text:
I couldn’t resist wrapping some advance copies of Mysteries for my upcoming signing at @cincybookshelf this Saturday!  The event is an open house that will also feature fellow Cincinnati authors Amy Brownlee, Rick Pender, Jeff Seuss, Beverly Erschell and Sue Ann Painter. I will be signing and chatting with readers from 1-3 in the afternoon. The first six people to arrive at my table with the top secret code phrase “Sir Fluffington” will receive a Mysteries of Thorn Manor ARC, with my only request being that you also make a purchase to support the Bookshelf. If you aren’t local, signed/personalized copies of all my books are available for order on the Bookshelf’s website and would make fabulous Christmas gifts—just leave a note in the comments at checkout that you would like a signed/personalized copy. You can also request gift wrapping. (Unfortunately, the Bookshelf doesn’t currently ship outside the US since it’s a small indie that isn’t equipped for international shipping, but I’ll see if I can find an alternative option for those of you who are outside the states)

I hope you’re all having a cozy start to winter, and I can’t wait to see you on Saturday!

#mysteriesofthornmanor #sorceryofthorns

I'm thrilled to share that Mysteries of Thorn Manor has received a lovely review from Kirkus, which made me smile because the feeling of taking a warm, indulgent bath was exactly what I was trying to evoke while writing the novella. I didn't expect that Mysteries would receive any official trade reviews at all, so this came as a fantastic surprise! 

#mysteriesofthornmanor #sorceryofthorns

By now I'm guessing that most of you have probably seen the @fairyloot announcement yesterday, but for those of you who haven't, I'm beyond thrilled to share their upcoming special editions of Sorcery of Thorns and An Enchantment of Ravens, created in collaboration with @simonkidsuk ! These beautiful editions coordinate with their earlier special edition of Vespertine and will complete a full matching set of my books. For more information about their features and how to purchase them, please make sure to visit FairyLoot's official announcement.

On a personal note, I can barely put into words how grateful I am to FairyLoot for taking on this long term project. As an author, it's a dream come true to see all of my novels redesigned in this classic and timeless style. They almost seem more as though they've been unearthed from a fairy tale library or the shelves of a dark academia fantasy than printed in the real world. But I know better, because for the past year, I've had the privilege of seeing behind the scenes glimpses of the hard work and talent involved in their creation. I owe my gratitude not only to FairyLoot, but to @micaelaalcainodesign , whose intricate cover illustrations never fail to take my breath away, and @avendellart , illustrator of the richly atmospheric endpaper art. Thank you for bringing these editions to life—and to everyone who purchases these editions, thank you also for supporting not only me but the other artists who put their hearts into this project. After years of deadlines, copyedits, and the other minutiae of publishing, sometimes you can forget the magic of making books, but this is one of those times that makes being an author feel truly special again.

Graphic credit: @blanca.design 

#fairyloot #anenchantmentofravens #sorceryofthorns

I’m delighted to announce that @cincybookshelf in Cincinnati will be hosting a launch party for Mysteries of Thorn Manor on Tuesday, January 17th at 6-8 PM! This will be a casual, cozy open house with tea and cupcakes where I will be chatting with readers while signing books. Everyone who purchases a copy of Thorn Manor in-person at the event, or preorders through The Bookshelf's website by January 11 (US orders only), will receive an exclusive bookmark along with their purchase.

For those of you who can't attend in-person, The Bookshelf is holding an Instagram live Q&A on Sunday, January 8 at 2 PM EST, graciously hosted by bookseller and writer @goresc1 . This will be a fantastic opportunity to ask questions and learn some behind-the-scenes tidbits about Mysteries of Thorn Manor.

I'm so grateful to The Bookshelf for pulling out all the stops to organize what will be the first true launch party of my career. I'm especially looking forward to it since my favorite types of events are the casual, intimate ones like this that allow me additional time to speak to readers one-on-one. The Bookshelf will even be serving my favorite flavor of tea, which is featured in a scene in Thorn Manor. I can't wait to see you there—and I'm baking cupcakes, so please try them!

Lastly, I would to take the time to thank my readers outside the US for their understanding, since I know some of you will be disappointed that international shipping isn't available through this venue. The Bookshelf is a small indie bookstore, and because of their local focus, they aren't set up to process international orders. I've seen how hard they're working to make this event possible, and the truth is that introducing international shipping would create an impossible burden for the already hard-working booksellers. I’m trying to find a way to make signed copies available to my international fans, and will make another post when I have more information to share. It’s a true honor to have the support of readers worldwide. Wherever you’re located, I’m thinking of you and appreciate you!

#mysteriesofthornmanor #sorceryofthorns

Look what arrived today! I’m over the moon to share these incredibly charming bookmarks designed by my talented friend @rejamrejam to look like the spine of a grimoire from Mysteries of Thorn Manor. This is my first time having bookmarks printed, and they turned out so beautifully! I will be giving them away with purchases of Thorn Manor at my January 17 @cincybookshelf launch party, and they will also be sent with every preorder placed through The Bookshelf by January 11 (availability limited to the US). As a reminder, if you would your Bookshelf preorder to be signed and/or personalized, just mention that in the comment box at checkout. I hope you’re all having a warm and cozy winter! 🥀❄️

#mysteriesofthornmanor #sorceryofthorns

I had so much fun signing tip-ins for the upcoming @fairyloot editions of Sorcery of Thorns and An Enchantment of Ravens. But it seems that while I was sleeping, a certain white cat tracked ink across the pages. Keep an eye out, because twelve special copies of Sorcery of Thorns are signed by both me AND Silas! 🐾

These stunning editions will be available for purchase in February. Please visit FairyLoot for more information!

#sorceryofthorns #anenchantmentofravens #mysteriesofthornmanor

Bonjour, lecteurs Français! I’ve been working on something special with  @leyaclub that I can’t wait to share with you. It’s been an absolute dream getting to collaborate with my brilliant French publishing team on this project, and keeping it a secret has been SO hard. Make sure to keep an eye on their social media for the upcoming announcement!

❄️
🌹
❄️

@lesladiesdeledition 

#sorceryofthorns #mysteriesofthornmanor

I know today isn’t fanart Friday, but this Silas illustration by @avendellart is a special piece that I’ve been wanting to feature for a long time. I’m absolutely in love with Avendell’s portrayal of Silas in all three(!!!) of his forms, including, of course, the great and terrible Sir Fluffington. Avendell is the artist responsible for the gorgeous endpaper illustrations featured in the @fairyloot special edition set, and I am simply thrilled to see artwork of Silas in the same style.

In case you’re wondering- yes, Silas does return in Mysteries of Thorn Manor! There’s even a short chapter from his perspective, which was so much fun to write!

#sorceryofthorns #mysteriesofthornmanor

I'm delighted to share that Mysteries of Thorn Manor has received a wonderful review from School Library Journal! Both SLJ and Kirkus have now called Mysteries charming and cozy, which pleases me to no end. I can't wait for this novella to find its way into readers' hands in less than five days! ❄️🌹

#mysteriesofthornmanor #sorceryofthorns

“A single white rose rested atop it, petals glistening with frost…” ❄️🌹

My author copies of Mysteries of Thorn Manor have arrived, and they are gorgeous! I’ve been taking a lot of pictures with roses lately, and you may not have noticed, but there’s always only one white rose. The reason for this can be found in the scene that the above quote is from. I can’t wait for readers to get there! Incredibly enough, Mysteries of Thorn Manor hits the shelves in less than four days, so there isn’t long to wait.

Don’t forget to view the second photo for a very special surprise on the naked hardcover! 🐾

#sorceryofthorns #mysteriesofthornmanor

I can't believe Mysteries of Thorn is finally out in the world today! I'm so excited for this novella to find its way into readers' hands. From the bottom of my heart, thank you for accompanying me on this journey. And thank you @simonteen for the beautiful graphic - I gasped out loud when I saw this for the first time!

For those of you are able to attend, I can't wait to see you at my launch party at @cincybookshelf this evening ❄️🌹

#mysteriesofthornmanor #sorceryofthorns

I am RIDICULOUSLY excited for my upcoming @owlcrate live this Friday at 8 PM EST, not least of all because I get to meet the incomparable @cory__mccarthy and @ar_capetta face to face! Supposedly this event is about Mysteries of Thorn Manor, but I'm so blown away by Cory's latest recent book Man O' War that there will be a bit of fangirling too.

Thank you for all your well wishes- I have fallen shamefully behind on Instagram during the publication chaos, but I deeply appreciate your kind words!

#mysteriesofthornmanor #sorceryofthorns

Here's another piece I've been wanting to share for what feels like forever—the post-duel kissing scene in Sorcery of Thorns, illustrated by @rosiethorns88. Rosie has an almost supernatural ability to capture scenes exactly as they appeared in my head, and her artwork is endlessly inspiring to me. She was kind enough to send me a signed print of her LitJoy collaboration art (the Royal Library battle scene) which sits above my desk and motivates me to write every time I look at it. While working on Mysteries of Thorn Manor, I often turned to both of these artworks for inspiration. If you haven't already seen the full version of this illustration, make sure to visit @rosiethorns88 because there's a surprise in the bottom right corner!

#sorceryofthorns #mysteriesofthornmanor

I'm over the moon to share that Mysteries of Thorn Manor has debuted at #3 on the New York Times bestseller list! I owe an eternal debt of gratitude to my amazing publishing team at @simonteen, the incredible booksellers who have lifted up my work, and you, my readers, who have supported me over the years with a generosity and kindness that never ceases to overwhelm me. It has been an immense privilege seeing this novella go from a personal project that I never expected to be published as a physical book, to being embraced by so many people. From the bottom of my heart, thank you!

#mysteriesofthornmanor

That’s a wrap on the whole gang!!! 🥹 

Prints are available and linked in my bio 💕 
I don’t think I’ve ever painted anything that made me so smushy. It was such a joy to paint them all together. Thank you everyone for the love along the way(!) and the hugest thanks to @margaret_rogerson for writing the best book and novella ever I’M FINE. 😭

#sorceryofthorns #mysteriesofthornmanor #margaretrogerson #charliebowater
I'm so excited to be heading to Toledo this weekend for the Northwest Ohio Teen Book Festival - I hope I'll see some of you there! #nwoteenbookfest

I know I haven't been on Instagram for a while, but I'm very excited for my upcoming May 27th Fae, Folk, and Fantasy event at @cincybookshelf with @booksbyintisar! Spots are limited as the Bookshelf doesn't have a lot of space, so if you're interested in attending, please make sure to reach out soon! For more information and updates, you can visit @cincybookshelf 📚❤️

Emerging from my hermit lair this morning to travel to Chicago, and SO excited to see everyone at the festival tomorrow! (Sorry for being such a hermit lately. I am thriving in the forest loam.)

#yam #yamidwest #andersonsbookshops @yamidwest

Have you seen the @fairyloot announcement today? I'm ridiculously excited to share the gorgeous upcoming FairyLoot edition of Mysteries of Thorn Manor, which matches the rest of the set and might be my favorite of them all. (As you can see, I couldn't resist trying to take a dark academia style photo of them together.) As always, a massive thank you to cover artist @micaelaalcainodesign and endpaper artist @avendellart for their stunning work on these editions! 

The last time I checked, there were still some copies of Sorcery of Thorns/An Enchantment of Ravens available on FairyLoot's UK website, act fast if you want to grab them!

For more information about how to purchase, please visit @fairyloot and thank you so much for your support!

#mysteriesofthornmanor #sorceryofthorns #fairyloot
